summary.span: 公开用于通过目录和子目录进行创建、移动和枚举的静态方法。

span.span: Exposes static methods for creating, moving, and enumerating through directories and subdirectories.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类的典型操作，如复制、 移动、 重命名、 创建和删除目录。Use the class for typical operations such as copying, moving, renaming, creating, and deleting directories. - 若要创建一个目录，请使用其中一个方法。To create a directory, use one of the methods. - 若要删除一个目录，请使用其中一个方法。To delete a directory, use one of the methods. - 若要获取或设置当前目录的应用，请使用或方法。To get or set the current directory for an app, use the or method. - 若要处理相关的信息创建、 访问和写入目录中，使用方法如下所示和。To manipulate information related to the creation, access, and writing of a directory, use methods such as and . 静态方法类执行的所有方法的安全检查。The static methods of the class perform security checks on all methods. 如果要多次重用对象，请考虑使用相应的实例方法的相反，因为安全检查将不总是有必要。If you are going to reuse an object several times, consider using the corresponding instance method of instead, because the security check will not always be necessary. 如果您正在执行只有一个目录相关的操作，则可能是使用静态更加高效方法，而不是相应实例方法。If you are performing only one directory-related action, it might be more efficient to use a static method rather than a corresponding instance method. 大多数方法需要进行操作的目录的路径。Most methods require the path to the directory that you are manipulating. > [!NOTE] > 在接受一个字符串的成员`path`参数，该路径必须是格式正确，或引发异常。In members that accept a string `path` parameter, that path must be well-formed or an exception is raised. 例如，如果路径是完全限定名称，但空格 ("c:\temp") 开头，路径字符串不被剪裁，因此路径被视为格式不正确，会引发的异常。For example, if a path is fully qualified but begins with a space (" c:\temp"), the path string isn't trimmed, so the path is considered malformed and an exception is raised. 此外，路径的组合不能完全限定两次。In addition, a path or a combination of paths cannot be fully qualified twice. 例如，"c:\temp c:\windows"还会引发异常。For example, "c:\temp c:\windows" also raises an exception. 请确保使用接受一个路径字符串的方法时您的路径的格式是否正确。Ensure that your paths are well-formed when using methods that accept a path string. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information see . 在接受一个路径的成员，路径可以引用一个文件或目录。In members that accept a path, the path can refer to a file or a directory. 为服务器和共享名称，可以使用完整路径、 相对路径或通用命名约定 (UNC) 路径。You can use a full path, a relative path, or a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path for a server and share name. 例如，以下所有条件都可接受的路径：For example, all the following are acceptable paths: - "c:\\\MyDir"在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"c:\MyDir"。"c:\\\MyDir" in C#, or "c:\MyDir" in Visual Basic. - "MyDir\\\MySubdir"在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"MyDir\MySubDir"。"MyDir\\\MySubdir" in C#, or "MyDir\MySubDir" in Visual Basic. - "\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare"在 C# 中，或"\\\MyServer\MyShare"在 Visual Basic 中。"\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare" in C#, or "\\\MyServer\MyShare" in Visual Basic. 默认情况下，对新目录的完全读/写访问权限授予所有用户。By default, full read/write access to new directories is granted to all users. 但是，应用程序必须具有正确的安全访问现有的目录。However, the app must have the correct security to access existing directories. 为目录及其所有的子目录，最终以目录分隔符字符的路径字符串的需权限。To demand permissions for a directory and all its subdirectories, end the path string with the directory separator character. (例如，"C:\Temp\\"C:\Temp\ 和所有子目录中授予访问权限。)仅为特定目录，最终的周期的路径字符串的需权限。(For example, "C:\Temp\\" grants access to C:\Temp\ and all its subdirectories.) To demand permissions only for a specific directory, end the path string with a period. (例如，"C:\Temp\\。"(For example, "C:\Temp\\." 授予访问权限仅为 C:\Temp\\，而不适用于及其子目录。)grants access only to C:\Temp\\, not to its subdirectories.) 在接受的成员`searchPattern`参数，搜索字符串可以是任意组合的原义字符和两个通配符;\*和？。In members that accept a `searchPattern` parameter, the search string can be any combination of literal characters and two wildcard characters; \* and ?. 此参数不能识别的正则表达式。This parameter does not recognize regular expressions. 有关详细信息，请参阅方法或使用任何其他方法`searchPattern`参数。For more information, see the method or any other method that uses the `searchPattern` parameter. 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). 并不支持用于[!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)]应用。 and are not supported for use in [!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)] apps. 有关如何访问文件和文件夹中的信息[!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)]应用，请参阅[访问数据和文件 （Windows 应用商店应用）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh758319.aspx)。For information about how to access files and folders in [!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)] apps, see [Accessing data and files (Windows Store apps)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh758319.aspx). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从目录中检索文本的所有文件并将它们移动到新目录。The following example shows how to retrieve all the text files from a directory and move them to a new directory. 将文件移动后，它们将不再存在的原始目录中。After the files are moved, they no longer exist in the original directory. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Directory#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/CS/class2.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Directory#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/VB/class2.vb#10)] 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来从一个目录，检索文本文件的集合，并在查询中使用该集合以查找包含"Example"的所有行。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to retrieve a collection of text files from a directory, and then use that collection in a query to find all the lines that contain "Example". [!code-csharp[System.IO.Directory#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/CS/class3.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Directory#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/VB/class3.vb#11)] 下面的示例演示如何将一个目录及其所有文件移到新目录。The following example demonstrates how to move a directory and all its files to a new directory. 原始目录不再存在之后它已被移动。The original directory no longer exists after it has been moved. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Directory#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/CS/class6.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Directory#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/VB/class6.vb#14)]

summary.span: 在指定路径中创建所有目录和子目录，除非它们已经存在。

span.span: Creates all directories and subdirectories in the specified path unless they already exist.

returns.span: 一个表示在指定路径的目录的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the directory at the specified path.

returns.span: 无论指定路径的目录是否已经存在，都将返回此对象。

span.span: This object is returned regardless of whether a directory at the specified path already exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的所有目录`path`创建的除非它们已经存在，或除非的某些部分`path`无效。Any and all directories specified in `path` are created, unless they already exist or unless some part of `path` is invalid. 如果该目录已存在，此方法不会创建一个新目录，但它将返回现有目录的对象。If the directory already exists, this method does not create a new directory, but it returns a object for the existing directory. `path`参数指定的目录路径，而不是文件路径。The `path` parameter specifies a directory path, not a file path. 从末尾删除尾随空格`path`参数之前创建的目录。Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before creating the directory. 可以在具有写入访问权限的共享上的远程计算机上创建一个目录。You can create a directory on a remote computer, on a share that you have write access to. 支持的 UNC 路径;例如，可以指定以下`path`:`\\2009\Archives\December`在 Visual Basic 中和`\\\\2009\\Archives\\December`C# 中。UNC paths are supported; for example, you can specify the following for `path`: `\\2009\Archives\December` in Visual Basic, and `\\\\2009\\Archives\\December` in C#. 使用仅冒号字符 （:） 创建一个目录不受支持，并将导致`NotSupportedException`引发。Creating a directory with only the colon character (:) is not supported, and will cause a `NotSupportedException` to be thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和删除指定的目录。The following example creates and deletes the specified directory. [!code-cpp[Dir_CreateDir#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dir_CreateDir/CPP/dir_createdir.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Dir_CreateDir#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dir_CreateDir/CS/dir_createdir.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Dir_CreateDir#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dir_CreateDir/VB/dir_createdir.vb#1)] 若要创建的目录 C:\Users\User1\Public\Html C:\Users\User1 当前目录时，使用任何以下调用以确保正确解释反斜杠。To create the directory C:\Users\User1\Public\Html when the current directory is C:\Users\User1, use any of the following calls to ensure that the backslash is interpreted properly. 在 Visual Basic:In Visual Basic: ``` Directory.CreateDirectory("Public\Html") Directory.CreateDirectory("\Users\User1\Public\Html") Directory.CreateDirectory("c:\Users\User1\Public\Html") ``` 在 C# 中：In C#: ``` Directory.CreateDirectory("Public\\Html"); Directory.CreateDirectory("\\Users\\User1\\Public\\Html"); Directory.CreateDirectory("c:\\Users\\User1\\Public\\Html"); ``` 在 c + +:In C++: ``` Directory::CreateDirectory("Public\\Html"); Directory::CreateDirectory("\\Users\\User1\\Public\\Html"); Directory::CreateDirectory("c:\\Users\\User1\\Public\\Html"); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法的重载使用访问控制，创建一个目录，因此不可能将安全性应用之前，无法访问目录。Use this method overload to create a directory with access control, so there is no chance the directory can be accessed before security is applied. 指定的所有目录`path`参数创建的除非它们已经存在，或除非的某些部分`path`无效。Any and all directories specified in the `path` parameter are created, unless they already exist or unless some part of `path` is invalid. `path`参数指定的目录路径，而不是文件路径。The `path` parameter specifies a directory path, not a file path. 如果该目录已存在，此方法不会创建一个新目录，但它将返回现有目录的对象。If the directory already exists, this method does not create a new directory, but it returns a object for the existing directory. 从末尾删除尾随空格`path`参数之前创建的目录。Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before creating the directory. 可以在具有写入访问权限的共享上的远程计算机上创建一个目录。You can create a directory on a remote computer, on a share that you have write access to. 支持的 UNC 路径;例如，可以指定以下`path`:`\\2009\Archives\December`在 Visual Basic 中和`\\\\2009\\Archives\\December`C# 中。UNC paths are supported; for example, you can specify the following for `path`: `\\2009\Archives\December` in Visual Basic, and `\\\\2009\\Archives\\December` in C#. 使用仅冒号字符 （:） 创建一个目录不支持，这会导致`NotSupportedException`引发。Creating a directory with only the colon character (:) is not supported and causes a `NotSupportedException` to be thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例使用两个用户帐户的访问规则创建一个新目录。The following example creates a new directory with access rules for two user accounts. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Directory#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/CS/class7.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Directory#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/VB/class7.vb#15)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的行为完全相同与`false`为第二个参数指定。This method behaves identically to with `false` specified for the second parameter. `path`参数可以指定相对或绝对路径信息。The `path` parameter may specify relative or absolute path information. 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅。To obtain the current working directory, see . 从末尾删除尾随空格`path`之前删除目录的参数。Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before deleting the directory. 此方法将引发中指定的目录如果`path`参数包含文件或子目录。This method throws an if the directory specified in the `path` parameter contains files or subdirectories. `path`参数不区分大小写。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 在某些情况下，如果具有指定的目录在文件资源管理器中打开方法可能不能将其删除。In some cases, if you have the specified directory open in File Explorer, the method may not be able to delete it. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建新的目录和子目录，并删除仅子目录。The following example shows how to create a new directory and subdirectory, and then delete only the subdirectory. remarks.format: ## Remarks `path`参数可以指定相对或绝对路径信息。The `path` parameter may specify relative or absolute path information. 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅。To obtain the current working directory, see . 从末尾删除尾随空格`path`之前删除目录的参数。Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before deleting the directory. `path`参数不区分大小写。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 如果`recursive`参数是`true`，用户必须具有对当前目录及其所有子目录的写入权限。If the `recursive` parameter is `true`, the user must have write permission for the current directory as well as for all subdirectories. 删除包含重新分析点，如符号链接或装入点的目录时，此方法的行为略有不同。The behavior of this method differs slightly when deleting a directory that contains a reparse point, such as a symbolic link or a mount point. 如果重新分析点是一个目录，例如装入点，它会卸载并删除该装入点。If the reparse point is a directory, such as a mount point, it is unmounted and the mount point is deleted. 此方法不通过重新分析点进行递归。This method does not recurse through the reparse point. 如果重分析点是到一个文件的符号链接，删除重新分析点，而不是符号链接的目标。If the reparse point is a symbolic link to a file, the reparse point is deleted and not the target of the symbolic link. 在某些情况下，如果具有指定的目录在文件资源管理器中打开方法可能不能将其删除。In some cases, if you have the specified directory open in File Explorer, the method may not be able to delete it. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在子目录中创建新的目录、 子目录和文件，然后以递归方式删除所有新项。The following example shows how to create a new directory, subdirectory, and file in the subdirectory, and then recursively delete all the new items. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Directory.Delete#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.directory.delete/cs/class2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Directory.Delete#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.directory.delete/vb/class2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定在相对或绝对路径信息`path`参数。You can specify relative or absolute path information in the `path` parameter. 相对路径的信息解释为相对于当前工作目录，可以使用确定方法。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory, which you can determine by using the method. 返回的目录名称的前缀中提供的值为`path`参数。The returned directory names are prefixed with the value you provided in the `path` parameter. 例如，如果提供的相对路径`path`参数，返回的目录名称将包含相对路径。For example, if you provide a relative path in the `path` parameter, the returned directory names will contain a relative path. 和方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用，你可以开始之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用，必须等待整个数组的名称之前可以访问该数组返回。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，当您正在使用多个文件和目录，可能更有效。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 不缓存返回的集合;每次调用在集合上将启动一个新的枚举。The returned collection is not cached; each call to the on the collection will start a new enumeration. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举指定路径中的顶级目录。The following example enumerates the top-level directories in a specified path. remarks.format: ## Remarks `searchPattern` 可以是文本和通配符字符的组合，但它不支持正则表达式。`searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions. 中允许以下通配说明符`searchPattern`。The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`. |通配符说明符Wildcard specifier|匹配Matches| |------------------------|-------------| |\* （星号）\* (asterisk)|在该位置的零个或多个字符。Zero or more characters in that position.| |?? （问号）(question mark)|在该位置的零个或一个字符。Zero or one character in that position.| 通配符以外的字符是原义字符。Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters. 例如，`searchPattern`字符串"\*t"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"t"结尾。For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t". `searchPattern`字符串"s\*"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"s"开头。The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s". `searchPattern` 不能以两个句点结束 ("..") 包含两个句点 ("..") 后跟或，也不可以包含任何无效字符。`searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by or , nor can it contain any invalid characters. 你可以使用 方法查询无效字符。You can query for invalid characters by using the method. 您可以指定在相对或绝对路径信息`path`参数。You can specify relative or absolute path information in the `path` parameter. 相对路径的信息解释为相对于当前工作目录，可以使用确定方法。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory, which you can determine by using the method. 返回的目录名称的前缀中提供的值为`path`参数。The returned directory names are prefixed with the value you provided in the `path` parameter. 例如，如果提供的相对路径`path`参数，返回的目录名称将包含相对路径。For example, if you provide a relative path in the `path` parameter, the returned directory names will contain a relative path. 和方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用，你可以开始之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用，必须等待整个数组的名称之前可以访问该数组返回。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，当您正在使用多个文件和目录，可能更有效。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 不缓存返回的集合;每次调用在集合上将启动一个新的枚举。The returned collection is not cached; each call to the on the collection will start a new enumeration. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举与指定的搜索模式匹配的顶级目录中指定的路径。The following example enumerates the top-level directories in a specified path that match a specified search pattern. remarks.format: ## Remarks `searchPattern` 可以是文本和通配符字符的组合，但它不支持正则表达式。`searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions. 中允许以下通配说明符`searchPattern`。The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`. |通配符说明符Wildcard specifier|匹配Matches| |------------------------|-------------| |\* （星号）\* (asterisk)|在该位置的零个或多个字符。Zero or more characters in that position.| |?? （问号）(question mark)|该位置中的一个字符。Exactly one character in that position.| 通配符以外的字符是原义字符。Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters. 例如，`searchPattern`字符串"\*t"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"t"结尾。For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t". `searchPattern`字符串"s\*"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"s"开头。The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s". `searchPattern` 不能以两个句点结束 ("..") 包含两个句点 ("..") 后跟或，也不可以包含任何无效字符。`searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by or , nor can it contain any invalid characters. 你可以使用 方法查询无效字符。You can query for invalid characters by using the method. 您可以指定在相对或绝对路径信息`path`参数。You can specify relative or absolute path information in the `path` parameter. 相对路径的信息解释为相对于当前工作目录，可以使用确定方法。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory, which you can determine by using the method. 返回的目录名称的前缀中提供的值为`path`参数。The returned directory names are prefixed with the value you provided in the `path` parameter. 例如，如果提供的相对路径`path`参数，返回的目录名称将包含相对路径。For example, if you provide a relative path in the `path` parameter, the returned directory names will contain a relative path. 和方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用，你可以开始之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用，必须等待整个数组的名称之前可以访问该数组返回。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，当您正在使用多个文件和目录，可能更有效。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 不缓存返回的集合;每次调用在集合上将启动一个新的枚举。The returned collection is not cached; each call to the on the collection will start a new enumeration. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举指定路径中与指定的搜索模式匹配的目录。The following example enumerates directories in a specified path that match a specified search pattern. 它使用`searchOption`参数来指定应在搜索中包含所有子目录。It uses the `searchOption` parameter to specify that all subdirectories should be included in the search. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以指定相对路径信息与`path`参数。You can specify relative path information with the `path` parameter. 相对路径的信息解释为相对于当前工作目录，可以使用确定方法。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory, which you can determine by using the method. 和方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用，你可以开始之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用，必须等待整个数组的名称之前可以访问该数组返回。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，当您正在使用多个文件和目录，可能更有效。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 不缓存返回的集合;每次调用在集合上将启动一个新的枚举。The returned collection is not cached; each call to the on the collection will start a new enumeration. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索目录中的所有文件，并将它们移动到新目录。The following example shows how to retrieve all the files in a directory and move them to a new directory. 将文件移动后，它们将不再存在的原始目录中。After the files are moved, they no longer exist in the original directory. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Directory#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/CS/class4.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Directory#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/VB/class4.vb#12)] 下面的示例枚举中指定的目录的文件读取的文件，每一行，然后显示的行，如果它包含字符串"Europe"。The following example enumerates the files in the specified directory, reads each line of the file, and displays the line if it contains the string "Europe". remarks.format: ## Remarks `searchPattern` 可以是文本和通配符字符的组合，但它不支持正则表达式。`searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions. 中允许以下通配说明符`searchPattern`。The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`. |通配符说明符Wildcard specifier|匹配Matches| |------------------------|-------------| |\* （星号）\* (asterisk)|在该位置的零个或多个字符。Zero or more characters in that position.| |?? （问号）(question mark)|在该位置的零个或一个字符。Zero or one character in that position.| 通配符以外的字符是原义字符。Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters. 例如，`searchPattern`字符串"\*t"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"t"结尾。For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t". `searchPattern`字符串"s\*"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"s"开头。The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s". > [!NOTE] > 当使用星号通配符`searchPattern`如"\*.txt"，指定的扩展中的字符数会影响搜索，如下所示：When you use the asterisk wildcard character in a `searchPattern` such as "\*.txt", the number of characters in the specified extension affects the search as follows: > > - 如果指定的扩展名为 3 个字符，该方法将返回具有指定扩展名以扩展名的文件。If the specified extension is exactly three characters long, the method returns files with extensions that begin with the specified extension. 例如，"\*.xls"返回"book.xls"和"book.xlsx"。For example, "\*.xls" returns both "book.xls" and "book.xlsx". > - 在所有其他情况下，该方法返回与指定的扩展完全匹配的文件。In all other cases, the method returns files that exactly match the specified extension. 例如，"\*.ai"返回"file.ai"而不是"file.aif"。For example, "\*.ai" returns "file.ai" but not "file.aif". > > 当使用问号通配符字符时，此方法将返回与匹配指定的文件扩展名的文件。When you use the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension. 例如，给定两个文件、"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother"，在目录中，搜索模式的"文件？。txt"返回只是第一个文件，而搜索模式的"文件\*.txt"返回这两个文件。For example, given two files, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", in a directory, a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns just the first file, whereas a search pattern of "file\*.txt" returns both files. `searchPattern` 不能以两个句点结束 ("..") 包含两个句点 ("..") 后跟或，也不可以包含任何无效字符。`searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by or , nor can it contain any invalid characters. 你可以使用 方法查询无效字符。You can query for invalid characters by using the method. 可以指定相对路径信息与`path`参数。You can specify relative path information with the `path` parameter. 相对路径的信息解释为相对于当前工作目录，可以使用确定方法。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory, which you can determine by using the method. 和方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用，你可以开始之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用，必须等待整个数组的名称之前可以访问该数组返回。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，当您正在使用多个文件和目录，可能更有效。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 不缓存返回的集合;每次调用在集合上将启动一个新的枚举。The returned collection is not cached; each call to the on the collection will start a new enumeration. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索目录中的所有文本文件，并将它们移动到新目录。The following example shows how to retrieve all the text files in a directory and move them to a new directory. 将文件移动后，它们将不再存在的原始目录中。After the files are moved, they no longer exist in the original directory. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Directory#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/CS/class2.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Directory#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/VB/class2.vb#10)] 下面的示例枚举指定目录中扩展名为.txt 的文件读取的文件，每一行，然后显示的行，如果它包含字符串"Europe"。The following example enumerates the files in the specified directory that have a .txt extension, reads each line of the file, and displays the line if it contains the string "Europe". remarks.format: ## Remarks `searchPattern` 可以是文本和通配符字符的组合，但它不支持正则表达式。`searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions. 中允许以下通配说明符`searchPattern`...The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`.. |通配符说明符Wildcard specifier|匹配Matches| |------------------------|-------------| |\* （星号）\* (asterisk)|在该位置的零个或多个字符。Zero or more characters in that position.| |?? （问号）(question mark)|在该位置的零个或一个字符。Zero or one character in that position.| 通配符以外的字符是原义字符。Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters. 例如，`searchPattern`字符串"\*t"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"t"结尾。For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t". `searchPattern`字符串"s\*"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"s"开头。The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s". > [!NOTE] > 当使用星号通配符`searchPattern`如"\*.txt"，指定的扩展中的字符数会影响搜索，如下所示：When you use the asterisk wildcard character in a `searchPattern` such as "\*.txt", the number of characters in the specified extension affects the search as follows: > > - 如果指定的扩展名为 3 个字符，该方法将返回具有指定扩展名以扩展名的文件。If the specified extension is exactly three characters long, the method returns files with extensions that begin with the specified extension. 例如，"\*.xls"返回"book.xls"和"book.xlsx"。For example, "\*.xls" returns both "book.xls" and "book.xlsx". > - 在所有其他情况下，该方法返回与指定的扩展完全匹配的文件。In all other cases, the method returns files that exactly match the specified extension. 例如，"\*.ai"返回"file.ai"而不是"file.aif"。For example, "\*.ai" returns "file.ai" but not "file.aif". > > 当使用问号通配符字符时，此方法将返回与匹配指定的文件扩展名的文件。When you use the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension. 例如，给定两个文件、"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother"，在目录中，搜索模式的"文件？。txt"返回只是第一个文件，而搜索模式的"文件\*.txt"返回这两个文件。For example, given two files, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", in a directory, a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns just the first file, whereas a search pattern of "file\*.txt" returns both files. `searchPattern` 不能以两个句点结束 ("..") 包含两个句点 ("..") 后跟或，也不可以包含任何无效字符。`searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by or , nor can it contain any invalid characters. 你可以使用 方法查询无效字符。You can query for invalid characters by using the method. 可以指定相对路径信息与`path`参数。You can specify relative path information with the `path` parameter. 相对路径的信息解释为相对于当前工作目录，可以使用确定方法。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory, which you can determine by using the method. 并方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用，你可以开始之前，则返回整个集合枚举的项的集合; 当你使用，必须等待整个数组的项然后才能访问该数组返回。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of entries before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of entries to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，当您正在使用多个文件和目录，可能更有效。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 不缓存返回的集合;每次调用在集合上将启动一个新的枚举。The returned collection is not cached; each call to the on the collection will start a new enumeration.

在所有其他情况下，该方法返回与指定的扩展完全匹配的文件。In all other cases, the method returns files that exactly match the specified extension. 例如，"\*.ai"返回"file.ai"而不是"file.aif"。For example, "\*.ai" returns "file.ai" but not "file.aif". > > 当使用问号通配符字符时，此方法将返回与匹配指定的文件扩展名的文件。When you use the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension. 例如，给定两个文件、"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother"，在目录中，搜索模式的"文件？。txt"返回只是第一个文件，而搜索模式的"文件\*.txt"返回这两个文件。For example, given two files, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", in a directory, a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns just the first file, whereas a search pattern of "file\*.txt" returns both files. `searchPattern` 不能以两个句点结束 ("..") 包含两个句点 ("..") 后跟或，也不可以包含任何无效字符。`searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by or , nor can it contain any invalid characters. 你可以使用 方法查询无效字符。You can query for invalid characters by using the method. 可以指定相对路径信息与`path`参数。You can specify relative path information with the `path` parameter. 相对路径的信息解释为相对于当前工作目录，可以使用确定方法。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory, which you can determine by using the method. 并方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用，你可以开始之前，则返回整个集合枚举的项的集合; 当你使用，必须等待整个数组的项然后才能访问该数组返回。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of entries before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of entries to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，当您正在使用多个文件和目录，可能更有效。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 不缓存返回的集合;每次调用在集合上将启动一个新的枚举。The returned collection is not cached; each call to the on the collection will start a new enumeration.

span.span: if refers to an existing directory; if the directory does not exist or an error occurs when trying to determine if the specified directory exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `path`参数允许指定相对或绝对路径信息。The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information. 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 从末尾删除尾随空格`path`之前检查目录是否存在的参数。Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before checking whether the directory exists. `path`参数不区分大小写。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 如果你不具有在目录中，最小的只读权限方法将返回`false`。If you do not have at a minimum read-only permission to the directory, the method will return `false`. 方法将返回`false`如果尝试确定是否存在指定的文件时出现任何错误。The method returns `false` if any error occurs while trying to determine if the specified file exists. 这可以在引发异常，例如传递文件名包含无效的字符或字符太多，失败或丢失的磁盘的情况下会发生或如果调用方不具有读取该文件的权限。This can occur in situations that raise exceptions such as passing a file name with invalid characters or too many characters, a failing or missing disk, or if the caller does not have permission to read the file. ## Examples 下面的示例命令行上采用的文件或目录名称的数组，确定哪种名称它，并相应地进行处理。The following example takes an array of file or directory names on the command line, determines what kind of name it is, and processes it appropriately. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来检索目录的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。Use the method to retrieve the access control list (ACL) entries for a directory. ACL 描述个人和/或组具有或没有执行到给定的文件或目录的特定操作的权限。An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file or directory. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：添加或移除访问控制列表项](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md). 在 NTFS 环境中，并如果用户具有向用户授予上的父文件夹的权限。In NTFS environments, and are granted to the user if the user has rights on the parent folder. 若要拒绝并，拒绝上的父目录。To deny and , deny on the parent directory. ## Examples 下面的示例使用和方法以添加所需的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项，然后从目录删除的 ACL 项。The following example uses the and the methods to add an access control list (ACL) entry and then remove an ACL entry from a directory. 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等同于用星号 (\*) 指定为搜索模式，因此它将返回所有子目录。如果需要搜索子目录，则使用方法，使您可以指定具有子目录的搜索`searchOption`参数。This method is identical to with the asterisk (\*) specified as the search pattern, so it returns all subdirectories.If you need to search subdirectories, use the method, which enables you to specify a search of subdirectories with the `searchOption` parameter. 和方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用，你可以开始之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用，必须等待整个数组的名称之前可以访问该数组返回。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，当您正在使用多个文件和目录，可能更有效。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. `path`参数可以指定相对或绝对路径信息。The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information. 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅。To obtain the current working directory, see . 此方法返回名称的前缀中提供的目录信息为`path`。The names returned by this method are prefixed with the directory information provided in `path`. `path`参数不区分大小写。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下面的示例命令行上采用的文件或目录名称的数组，确定哪种名称它，并相应地进行处理。The following example takes an array of file or directory names on the command line, determines what kind of name it is, and processes it appropriately. returns.span: 指定目录中与搜索模式匹配的子目录的完整名称（包含路径）的数组；如果未找到任何文件，则为空数组。

span.span: An array of the full names (including paths) of the subdirectories that match the search pattern in the specified directory, or an empty array if no directories are found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回在指定目录下直接与指定的搜索模式匹配的所有子目录。This method returns all subdirectories directly under the specified directory that match the specified search pattern. 如果指定的目录具有任何子目录中，或没有子目录匹配`searchPattern`参数，此方法返回一个空数组。If the specified directory has no subdirectories, or no subdirectories match the `searchPattern` parameter, this method returns an empty array. 仅顶级目录中搜索。Only the top directory is searched. 如果你想要搜索子目录，则使用方法并指定中`searchOption`参数。If you want to search the subdirectories as well, use the method and specify in the `searchOption` parameter. `searchPattern` 可以是文本和通配符字符的组合，但它不支持正则表达式。`searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions. 中允许以下通配说明符`searchPattern`。The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`. |通配符说明符Wildcard specifier|匹配Matches| |------------------------|-------------| |\* （星号）\* (asterisk)|在该位置的零个或多个字符。Zero or more characters in that position.| |?? （问号）(question mark)|在该位置的零个或一个字符。Zero or one character in that position.| 通配符以外的字符是原义字符。Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters. 例如，`searchPattern`字符串"\*t"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"t"结尾。For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t". `searchPattern`字符串"s\*"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"s"开头。The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s". `searchPattern` 不能以两个句点结束 ("..") 包含两个句点 ("..") 后跟或，也不可以包含任何无效字符。`searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by or , nor can it contain any invalid characters. 你可以使用 方法查询无效字符。You can query for invalid characters by using the method. `path`参数可以指定相对或绝对路径信息和不区分大小写。The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information, and is not case-sensitive. 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅。To obtain the current working directory, see . 和方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用，你可以开始之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用，必须等待整个数组的名称之前可以访问该数组返回。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，当您正在使用多个文件和目录，可能更有效。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下面的示例的目录路径中指定的字母开头的计数。The following example counts the number of directories in a path that begin with the specified letter. [!code-cpp[Dir_GetDirs2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dir_GetDirs2/CPP/dir_getdirs2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Dir_GetDirs2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dir_GetDirs2/CS/dir_getdirs2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Dir_GetDirs2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Dir_GetDirs2/VB/dir_getdirs2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `path`参数可以指定相对或绝对路径信息和不区分大小写。The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information, and is not case-sensitive. 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅。To obtain the current working directory, see . `searchPattern` 可以是文本和通配符字符的组合，但它不支持正则表达式。`searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions. 中允许以下通配说明符`searchPattern`。The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`. |通配符说明符Wildcard specifier|匹配Matches| |------------------------|-------------| |\* （星号）\* (asterisk)|在该位置的零个或多个字符。Zero or more characters in that position.| |?? （问号）(question mark)|在该位置的零个或一个字符。Zero or one character in that position.| 通配符以外的字符是原义字符。Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters. 例如，`searchPattern`字符串"\*t"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"t"结尾。For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t". `searchPattern`字符串"s\*"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"s"开头。The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s". `searchPattern` 不能以两个句点结束 ("..") 包含两个句点 ("..") 后跟或，也不可以包含任何无效字符。`searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by or , nor can it contain any invalid characters. 你可以使用 方法查询无效字符。You can query for invalid characters by using the method. 和方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用，你可以开始之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用，必须等待整个数组的名称之前可以访问该数组返回。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，当您正在使用多个文件和目录，可能更有效。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下面的示例的目录路径中指定的字母开头的计数。The following example counts the number of directories that begin with the specified letter in a path. 仅顶级目录中搜索。Only the top-level directory is searched. remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用，你可以开始之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用，必须等待整个数组的名称之前可以访问该数组返回。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，当您正在使用多个文件和目录，可能更有效。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 返回的文件名追加到所提供`path`参数。The returned file names are appended to the supplied `path` parameter. 此方法等同于用星号 (\*) 指定为搜索模式。This method is identical to with the asterisk (\*) specified as the search pattern. `path`参数可以指定相对或绝对路径信息。The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information. 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅。To obtain the current working directory, see . 无法保证返回的文件名的顺序;使用方法是否需要特定的排序顺序。The order of the returned file names is not guaranteed; use the method if a specific sort order is required. `path`参数不区分大小写。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法以从用户指定的位置返回文件的名称。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to return file names from a user-specified location. 该示例配置为捕获所有错误普遍适用于此方法。The example is configured to catch all errors common to this method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的文件名追加到所提供`path`参数和返回的文件名的顺序不能保证; 使用方法是否需要特定的排序顺序。The returned file names are appended to the supplied `path` parameter and the order of the returned file names is not guaranteed; use the method if a specific sort order is required. `searchPattern` 可以是文本和通配符字符的组合，但它不支持正则表达式。`searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions. 中允许以下通配说明符`searchPattern`。The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`. |通配符说明符Wildcard specifier|匹配Matches| |------------------------|-------------| |\* （星号）\* (asterisk)|在该位置的零个或多个字符。Zero or more characters in that position.| |?? （问号）(question mark)|在该位置的零个或一个字符。Zero or one character in that position.| 通配符以外的字符是原义字符。Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters. 例如，`searchPattern`字符串"\*t"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"t"结尾。For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t". `searchPattern`字符串"s\*"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"s"开头。The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s". `searchPattern` 不能以两个句点结束 ("..") 包含两个句点 ("..") 后跟或，也不可以包含任何无效字符。`searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by or , nor can it contain any invalid characters. 你可以使用 方法查询无效字符。You can query for invalid characters by using the method. > [!NOTE] > 当使用星号通配符`searchPattern`如"\*.txt"，指定的扩展中的字符数会影响搜索，如下所示：When you use the asterisk wildcard character in a `searchPattern` such as "\*.txt", the number of characters in the specified extension affects the search as follows: > > - 如果指定的扩展名为 3 个字符，该方法将返回具有指定扩展名以扩展名的文件。If the specified extension is exactly three characters long, the method returns files with extensions that begin with the specified extension. 例如，"\*.xls"返回"book.xls"和"book.xlsx"。For example, "\*.xls" returns both "book.xls" and "book.xlsx". > - 在所有其他情况下，该方法返回与指定的扩展完全匹配的文件。In all other cases, the method returns files that exactly match the specified extension. 例如，"\*.ai"返回"file.ai"而不是"file.aif"。For example, "\*.ai" returns "file.ai" but not "file.aif". > > 当使用问号通配符字符时，此方法将返回与匹配指定的文件扩展名的文件。When you use the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension. 例如，给定两个文件、"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother"，在目录中，搜索模式的"文件？。txt"返回只是第一个文件，而搜索模式的"文件\*.txt"返回这两个文件。For example, given two files, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", in a directory, a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns just the first file, whereas a search pattern of "file\*.txt" returns both files. > [!NOTE] > 此方法检查针对使用 8.3 文件名的格式和长文件名的格式的文件名称，因为的搜索模式类似于"\*1\*.txt"可能返回意外的文件的名称。Because this method checks against file names with both the 8.3 file name format and the long file name format, a search pattern similar to "\*1\*.txt" may return unexpected file names. 例如，使用的搜索模式"\*1\*.txt"返回"longfilename.txt"，因为等效 8.3 文件名称格式是"LONGFI~1.TXT"。For example, using a search pattern of "\*1\*.txt" returns "longfilename.txt" because the equivalent 8.3 file name format is "LONGFI~1.TXT". 和方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用，你可以开始之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用，必须等待整个数组的名称之前可以访问该数组返回。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，当您正在使用多个文件和目录，可能更有效。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. `path`参数可以指定相对或绝对路径信息。The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information. 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅。To obtain the current working directory, see . `path`参数不区分大小写。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下面的示例计算指定以字母开头的文件数。The following example counts the number of files that begin with the specified letter. `searchPattern`字符串"s\*"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"s"开头。The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s". `searchPattern` 不能以两个句点结束 ("..") 包含两个句点 ("..") 后跟或，也不可以包含任何无效字符。`searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by or , nor can it contain any invalid characters. 你可以使用 方法查询无效字符。You can query for invalid characters by using the method. > [!NOTE] > 当使用星号通配符`searchPattern`如"\*.txt"，指定的扩展中的字符数会影响搜索，如下所示：When you use the asterisk wildcard character in a `searchPattern` such as "\*.txt", the number of characters in the specified extension affects the search as follows: > > - 如果指定的扩展名为 3 个字符，该方法将返回具有指定扩展名以扩展名的文件。If the specified extension is exactly three characters long, the method returns files with extensions that begin with the specified extension. 例如，"\*.xls"返回"book.xls"和"book.xlsx"。For example, "\*.xls" returns both "book.xls" and "book.xlsx". > - 在所有其他情况下，该方法返回与指定的扩展完全匹配的文件。In all other cases, the method returns files that exactly match the specified extension. 例如，"\*.ai"返回"file.ai"而不是"file.aif"。For example, "\*.ai" returns "file.ai" but not "file.aif". > > 当使用问号通配符字符时，此方法将返回与匹配指定的文件扩展名的文件。When you use the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension. 例如，给定两个文件、"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother"，在目录中，搜索模式的"文件？。txt"返回只是第一个文件，而"file\*.txt"的搜索模式返回这两个文件。For example, given two files, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", in a directory, a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns just the first file, whereas a search pattern of "file\*.txt" returns both files. > [!NOTE] > 此方法检查针对使用 8.3 文件名的格式和长文件名的格式的文件名称，因为的搜索模式类似于"\*1\*.txt"可能返回意外的文件的名称。Because this method checks against file names with both the 8.3 file name format and the long file name format, a search pattern similar to "\*1\*.txt" may return unexpected file names. 例如，使用的搜索模式"\*1\*.txt"返回"longfilename.txt"，因为等效 8.3 文件名称格式是"LONGFI~1.TXT"。For example, using a search pattern of "\*1\*.txt" returns "longfilename.txt" because the equivalent 8.3 file name format is "LONGFI~1.TXT". 和方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用，你可以开始之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用，必须等待整个数组的名称之前可以访问该数组返回。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，当您正在使用多个文件和目录，可能更有效。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 文件名称包含的完整路径。The file names include the full path. `path`参数可以指定相对或绝对路径信息。The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information. 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅。To obtain the current working directory, see . `path`参数不区分大小写。The `path` remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法保证返回的文件和目录名称的顺序;使用方法是否需要特定的排序顺序。The order of the returned file and directory names is not guaranteed; use the method if a specific sort order is required. 并方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用，你可以开始之前，则返回整个集合枚举的项的集合; 当你使用，必须等待整个数组的项然后才能访问该数组返回。The and methods differ as follows: When you use , you can start enumerating the collection of entries before the whole collection is returned; when you use , you must wait for the whole array of entries to be returned before you can access the array. 因此，当您正在使用多个文件和目录，可能更有效。Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, can be more efficient. 此方法等同于用星号 (\*) 指定为搜索模式。This method is identical to with the asterisk (\*) specified as the search pattern. `path`参数允许指定相对或绝对路径信息。The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information. 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅。To obtain the current working directory, see . `path`参数不区分大小写。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用控制台到数组中的每个字符串方法来填充的字符串数组的所有文件和子目录中的用户指定的位置并将打印名称。The following example uses the method to fill an array of strings with the names of all files and subdirectories in a user-specified location and prints each string in the array to the console. 该示例配置为捕获所有错误普遍适用于此方法。The example is configured to catch all errors common to this method. remarks.format: ## Remarks `path`参数可以指定相对或绝对路径信息。The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information. 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅。To obtain the current working directory, see . 从末尾删除尾随空格`path`之前获取目录的参数。Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before getting the directory. 此方法返回的字符串包含的路径，但不是包括，最后一个中的所有字符或。The string returned by this method consists of all characters in the path up to, but not including, the last or . 例如，将"C:\Directory\SubDirectory\test.txt"的路径传递给返回"C:\Directory\SubDirectory"。For example, passing the path "C:\Directory\SubDirectory\test.txt" to returns "C:\Directory\SubDirectory". 传递"C:\Directory\SubDirectory"返回"C:\Directory"。Passing "C:\Directory\SubDirectory" returns "C:\Directory". 但是，传递"C:\Directory\SubDirectory\\"返回"C:\Directory\SubDirectory"，因为结束的目录分隔符是后"子目录"。However, passing "C:\Directory\SubDirectory\\" returns "C:\Directory\SubDirectory", because the ending directory separator is after "SubDirectory". `path`参数不区分大小写。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来检索父目录的用户指定的位置，"路径"。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to retrieve the parent directory of a user-specified location, "path". 返回的值方法然后打印到控制台。The value returned by the method is then printed to the console. 该示例配置为捕获所有错误普遍适用于此方法。The example is configured to catch all errors common to this method. span.span: Moves a file or a directory and its contents to a new location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用指定的名称创建一个新的目录`destDirName`，并将移动的内容`sourceDirName`到新创建的目标目录。This method creates a new directory with the name specified by `destDirName` and moves the contents of `sourceDirName` to the newly created destination directory. 如果你尝试将一个目录移动到的目录中已存在，会发生。If you try to move a directory to a directory that already exists, an will occur. 例如，如果尝试将 c:\mydir 移动到 c:\public，和 c:\public 已存在，将发生异常。For example, an exception will occur if you try to move c:\mydir to c:\public, and c:\public already exists. 或者，可以指定"c:\\\public\\\mydir"作为`destDirName`参数，提供"mydir"不存在下"c:\\\public"，或指定新的目录名称，如"c:\\\newdir"。Alternatively, you could specify "c:\\\public\\\mydir" as the `destDirName` parameter, provided that "mydir" does not exist under "c:\\\public", or specify a new directory name such as "c:\\\newdir". `sourceDirName`和`destDirName`参数允许指定相对或绝对路径信息。The `sourceDirName` and `destDirName` arguments are permitted to specify relative or absolute path information. 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅。To obtain the current working directory, see . 将目录移动之前，从该路径参数的末尾删除尾随空格。Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the path parameters before moving the directory. 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将一个目录及其所有文件移到新目录。The following example demonstrates how to move a directory and all its files to a new directory. 原始目录不再存在之后它已被移动。The original directory no longer exists after it has been moved. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Directory#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/CS/class6.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Directory#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Directory/VB/class6.vb#14)]

summary.span: 将 对象描述的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项应用于指定的目录。

span.span: Applies access control list (ACL) entries described by a object to the specified directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法适用于表示非继承的 ACL 列表的文件的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。The method applies access control list (ACL) entries to a file that represents the noninherited ACL list. > [!CAUTION] > 为 ACL 指定`directorySecurity`参数替换的现有目录的 ACL。The ACL specified for the `directorySecurity` parameter replaces the existing ACL for the directory. 若要添加新用户的权限，请使用方法可以获取现有 ACL 并对其进行修改。To add permissions for a new user, use the method to obtain the existing ACL and modify it. ACL 描述个人和/或组具有或没有执行到给定的文件或目录的特定操作的权限。An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file or directory. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：添加或移除访问控制列表项](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md). 方法仅保持对象创建后修改的对象。The method persists only objects that have been modified after object creation. 如果尚未修改对象，它不会保存到文件。If a object has not been modified, it will not be persisted to a file. 因此，不能检索对象从一个文件，并对另一个文件重新应用相同的对象。Therefore, it is not possible to retrieve a object from one file and reapply the same object to another file. 若要将 ACL 信息从一个文件复制到另一种：To copy ACL information from one file to another: 1. 使用方法来检索源文件中的对象。Use the method to retrieve the object from the source file. 2. 创建一个新目标文件的对象。Create a new object for the destination file. 3. 使用或源方法对象来检索 ACL 信息。Use the or method of the source object to retrieve the ACL information. 4. 使用或方法以将信息复制到目标的步骤 3 中检索对象。Use the or method to copy the information retrieved in step 3 to the destination object. 5. 设置目标对象与目标文件使用方法。Set the destination object to the destination file using the method. 在 NTFS 环境中，并如果用户具有向用户授予上的父文件夹的权限。In NTFS environments, and are granted to the user if the user has rights on the parent folder. 若要拒绝并，拒绝上的父目录。To deny and , deny on the parent directory. ## Examples 下面的示例使用和方法以添加所需的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项，然后从目录删除的 ACL 项。The following example uses the and the methods to add an access control list (ACL) entry and then remove an ACL entry from a directory. 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.DiretoryInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `path`参数允许指定相对或绝对路径信息。The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information. 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅。To obtain the current working directory, see . `path`参数不区分大小写。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 使用协调世界时 (UTC) 输出时，下面的示例说明了在输出中的差异。The following example illustrates the differences in output when using Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) output. [!code-cpp[System.IO.UTCExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UTCExample/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.UTCExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UTCExample/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.UTCExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UTCExample/VB/example.vb#1)]

exception.span: 未找到指定路径。

span.span: The specified path was not found.

exception.span: 为长度为零的字符串，仅包含空格，或包含一个或多个无效字符。

span.span: is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.

exception.span: 你可以使用 方法查询无效字符。

span.span: You can query for invalid characters with the method.

exception.span: 为 。

span.span: is .

exception.span: 指定的路径和/或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

span.span: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.

exception.span: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission.

exception.span: 当前操作系统不是 Windows NT 或更高版本。

span.span: The current operating system is not Windows NT or later.

exception.span: 指定一个超出该操作允许的日期或时间范围的值。

span.span: specifies a value outside the range of dates or times permitted for this operation.

permission.span: 用于写入到指定的文件或目录。

span.span: for writing to the specified file or directory.
Associated enumeration:
File and Stream I/O
How to: Read Text from a File

summary.span: 设置上次写入目录的日期和时间。

span.span: Sets the date and time a directory was last written to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `path`参数允许指定相对或绝对路径信息。The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information. 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory. 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅。To obtain the current working directory, see . `path`参数不区分大小写。The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive. 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用`SetLastWriteTime`。The following example demonstrates how to use `SetLastWriteTime`.
